name: Tactical Mechanical Keyboard
description: Military-grade mechanical keyboard with Cherry MX switches. Rated for 50 million keystrokes. Essential for extended terminal operations and code compilation.

name: Audio Isolation Headset
description: Active noise cancellation technology blocks external interference. Perfect for maintaining focus during critical system operations and encrypted communications.

name: Strategic Operations Manual
description: Sun Tzu's ancient text on tactical warfare and strategic thinking. Required reading for understanding competitive dynamics and resource allocation.

name: Ergonomic Command Station
description: Professional-grade operator chair with lumbar support systems. Designed for 12+ hour operational shifts with adjustable positioning controls.

name: Workstation Organization Module
description: Precision-engineered desk organizer crafted from sustainable materials. Optimizes workspace efficiency with dedicated equipment compartments.

name: Quantum Coffee Processing Unit
description: High-precision espresso machine with temperature stability controls. Critical for maintaining operator alertness during extended debugging sessions.
